title: Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform
text:
The Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform is a junior ministerial post in the <a href="Department%20of%20Public%20Expenditure%20and%20Reform">Department of Public Expenditure and Reform</a> of the <a href="Government%20of%20Ireland">Government of Ireland</a> who performs duties and functions delegated by the <a href="Minister%20for%20Public%20Expenditure%20and%20Reform">Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform</a>. A <a href="Minister%20of%20State%20%28Ireland%29">Minister of State</a> does not hold <a href="Cabinet%20%28government%29">cabinet</a> rank.
There are currently two Ministers of State, who were appointed in July 2020:
